title: What do 75% white 25% African American people look like? - Quora
tags: African American Experience in the United States of America

response.answer_text: Hm interesting well I know people I know a lot of women who are mixed with whites boyfriends or white husbands who have children (the women are mixed with black and white) there kids usually come out white, like uh colored eyes straight hair and pale skin, basically due to 50% of white and 100% white living it’s extremely common for that to happen now my friend Connor his dad is mixed (black and white) and his mom is a white blonde blue eyes , Connor came out looking like a regular brunette guy pale skin straight hair with blue eyes, small nose, basically looks 100% white. Hm I have an aunt who’s biracial and her husband is 75% white biracial one of there kids has pale skin loose curly hair and European facial features, the other kid came out brown/lightskin, European facial features loose curly hair 2 came out looking black, basically my first examples answer your questions

I remember seeing a photo in a book I was reading about the South. It showed three children of a mixed race couple. The son looked like both his parents were black. One daughter looked like a mulatto (the term used in Louisiana for mixed race people) and the other daughter looked like she was not merely white, but that she might have had Aryan ancestry - serious white. While laws may be ancestral genetic characteristics are digital, and depend on whether certain genes are “off” or “on”
